titleStmt.title: The speech of Sr. George Pudsey Kt. at the time of his being sworn. Recorder of the city of Oxford in the Council-chamber of the same city, on Tuesday the eighth day of January 1683[/]4. where they agreed to the sealing the instrument sent by His Majesty. Order'd by act of Council, that Sir George Pudsey Knt. be desir'd, to print his speech. Baker.
titleStmt.author: Pudsey, George, Sir, b. 1664?
